title: Stage Lv7-P1-S03
description: Level 7 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: She had been working on the project for months when the company suddenly changed its direction.
They had been negotiating the contract for weeks before reaching a final agreement.
learning_points: Level 7 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 회사가 갑자기 방향을 바꿨을 때, 그녀는 몇 달 동안 그 프로젝트를 진행해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: She had been working on the project for months when the company suddenly changed its direction.

sentences.kr: 그들은 최종 합의에 도달하기 전에 몇 주 동안 계약을 협상해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: They had been negotiating the contract for weeks before reaching a final agreement.

sentences.kr: 기회가 마침내 나타났을 때, 나는 이 결정에 대해 오랫동안 생각해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: I had been thinking about this decision for a long time when the opportunity finally presented itself.

sentences.kr: 팀은 새로운 리더가 임명되기 전까지 어려운 상황에서 고생해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: The team had been struggling with the difficult situation until a new leader was appointed.

sentences.kr: 그는 해결책을 찾기 전에 여러 달 동안 그 문제를 연구해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: He had been researching the problem for several months before finding a solution.

sentences.kr: 회사는 새로운 투자자를 만나기 전까지 자금 조달에 어려움을 겪고 있지 않았다.
sentences.en: The company hadn't been experiencing funding difficulties until they met the new investor.

sentences.kr: 학생들은 새로운 교수가 오기 전까지 그 과목을 즐기며 공부해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: The students had been enjoying studying the subject until the new professor arrived.

sentences.kr: 그녀는 승진 소식을 들었을 때, 몇 년 동안 그 목표를 위해 노력해오고 있었다.
sentences.en: When she heard about the promotion, she had been working toward that goal for years.
